TopicTitle: Gazing upon the stars above him for the rest of his days...

Articles.Content:
The first use of the new wheels. The first use of the Cupola cockpit. And the first, yet grim use of the flag...

A Kerbal had to be left on the Mun. He was overjoyed when he found out he found out he will be the first to step on the Mun in the 20th era of Kerbal Space Program. His vessel had all the elements that define Kerbal ingenuity: wheels with extreme traction, a cockpit with which no phenomena can escape the bright eyes and the very first flag to be planted, making a mark on history. Even more, the vessel was the first to include both, a base and a rover in the same package. The project leaders named it Deliveryboy, not realising the irony that was about to occur. The project prooved too ambitious. I will let the Kerbal who had no one to write an epitaph for him speak for himself.

You will be remebered, Joeberry Kerman.
